column3: atītaṃ n'ānvāgameyya, nappaṭikaṅkhe anāgataṃ. yadatītam'pahīnan'taṃ, appattañ'ca anāgataṃ.
uṭṭhānen'appamādena, saṃyamena damena ca, dīpaṃ kayirātha medhāvī, yaṃ ogho n'ābhikīrati.
column4: anagho ve ahaṃ yakkha, atho nandī na vijjati, atho maṃ ekam'āsīnaṃ, aratī n'ābhikīratī'ti.

column3: kacci te, bhante, bhikkhū samma'd'eva aññaṃ byākaṃsu udāhu sant'etth'ekacce bhikkhū adhimānena aññaṃ byākaṃsū'ti?
suppatiṭṭhitapādo kho pana bhavaṃ gotamo, idam'pi tassa bhoto gotamassa mahāpurisassa mahāpurisalakkhaṇaṃ bhavati.
